page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: {COATES SCHOOL - SUMMER.} ALL THE SCHOOL WENT TO BURFORD TO THE COTSWOLD WILDLIFE PARK.THE JUNIORS WENT TO BLEDISLOE LODGE TO SEE THE COMMUNICATION CENTRE AND THE HOUSE. SEVERAL OF US TRIED BEING NEWSREADERS AND HELPED TO WORK THE TELEVISION CAMERAS.WE GAVE THEM SOME SMALL TREES WE HAD GROWN FROM SEEDS FOR THEIR GARDENS.WE WENT TO SMERILL FARM MUSEUM AND LIKED THE OLD TOYS AND MACHINERY. THE LIBRARY VAN CAME TO CHANGE ALL THE SCHOOL LIBRARY BOOKS. ALL THE JUNIORS TOOK PART IN THE DISTRICT SPORTS AT CHESTERTON SCHOOL. ROBERT CAME SECOND SO HE TOOK PART IN THE AREA SPORTS AT VICTORIA ROAD. WE ALL WENT TO RODMARTON SCHOOL FOR A SPORTS DAY WITH RODMARTON AND SAPPERTON SCHOOLS. STUART WAS THE BEST JUNIOR AND ZOE THE BEST INFANT SO THEY HAD THE COATES SCHOOL SPORTS CUPS.
